1.rationale:
Let me think out loud. I'm currently at (9, 2) and I want to move towards the apple at (1, 4). I'll move right, which will take me from (9, 2) to (8, 2) first, and then potentially to (7, 2), and so on, until I reach the apple.

Considering all the possible paths and the apple locations, I think I can make a safe move... RIGHT. 

But I should also plan my next move. I need to set a strategy to achieve getting a few more points while being cautious. Let's make a mental note for the next turn... Next turn's strategy: remain cautious, stay aware of the enemy, and attempt to reach at least one apple in a way that maximizes the chances of acquiring it while avoiding potential conflicts.
